subject: Re: [junit] Combine textui and swingui advantages?
msgSnippet: ... Here s how I would try it: create a subclass of the SwingUI TestRunner in which you register a ResultPrinter as an extra TestListener. I bet that would
messageBody:
gundoroff wrote:
> Is there any way to run tests using the junit.swingui.TestRunner with
> having the short summary of found errors and falures in my console
> (e.g. Messages Log in JDeveloper), like as using
> junit.textui.TestRunner?
> In other words, how to have swingui and textui both?

Here's how I would try it: create a subclass of the SwingUI TestRunner
in which you register a ResultPrinter as an extra TestListener. I bet
that would work.

Good luck.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
